Title: Encourages the participation of minority and women-owned business enterprises in state contracts
Summary: Encourages the participation of minority- and women-owned business enterprises in state contracts by avoiding unnecessary and unjustified bundling of contract requirements that preclude minority- and women-owned business participation.
LawCode: Amd ยง313, Exec L; amd ยง139-g, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the state finance law, in relation to encouraging the participation of minority and women-owned business enterprises in state contracts
